Type 2 Questions.question: What are the different parts of the brain that you're curious about that you've studied?
Just to get a sense, are us humans special in the presence of the prefrontal cortex?
What lessons can we draw from that that we can bring into the artificial intelligence world?
Like what on the team at DeepMind, what kind of human can occupy these two realms?
Do you also share the feeling that not enough folks are studying this aspect of interaction?
How do you create AI systems that increase the quality and the health of a conversation?
What would it mean for an AI system to really come to understand what humans want?
You know, humans want help with certain things, but they don't want everything done for them, right?
